API reference¶

Data Module¶

osnap.data.db A dict with attribute-access.
osnap.data.metros A GeoDataFrame object is a pandas.DataFrame that has a column with geometry.
osnap.data.read_ltdb(sample, fullcount) Read & store data from Brown’s Longitudinal Tract Database (LTDB).
osnap.data.read_ncdb(filepath) Read & store data from Geolytics’s Neighborhood Change Database.
osnap.data.Community(source[, statefips, …]) Spatial and tabular data for a collection of “neighborhoods”.

Analyze Module¶

Neighborhood Clustering Methods¶

Model neighborhood differentiation using multivariate clustering algorithms

osnap.analyze.cluster(dataset[, n_clusters, …]) Create a geodemographic typology by running a cluster analysis on the metro area’s neighborhood attributes
osnap.analyze.cluster_spatial(dataset[, …]) Create a spatial geodemographic typology by running a cluster analysis on the metro area’s neighborhood attributes and including a contiguity constraint.

Clustering algorithms¶

The following algorithms may be passed to osnap.analyze.cluster or osnap.analyze.cluster_spatial but they should not be called directly

Classic (aspatial) Clustering¶
osnap.analyze.analytics.affinity_propagation(X) Clustering with Affinity Propagation.
osnap.analyze.analytics.gaussian_mixture(X) Clustering with Gaussian Mixture Model
osnap.analyze.analytics.hdbscan(X[, …]) Clustering with Hierarchical DBSCAN
osnap.analyze.analytics.kmeans(X, n_clusters) K-Means clustering.
osnap.analyze.analytics.spectral(X, n_clusters) Short summary.
osnap.analyze.analytics.ward(X[, n_clusters]) Agglomerative clustering using Ward linkage.
Spatial Clustering¶
osnap.analyze.analytics.azp(X, w[, n_clusters]) AZP clustering algorithm
osnap.analyze.analytics.max_p(X, w[, …]) Max-p clustering algorithm [Duque2012]
osnap.analyze.analytics.skater(X, w[, …]) SKATER spatial clustering algorithm.
osnap.analyze.analytics.spenc(X, w[, …]) Spatially encouraged spectral clustering
osnap.analyze.analytics.ward_spatial(X, w[, …]) Agglomerative clustering using Ward linkage with a spatial connectivity

Neighborhod Dynamics Methods¶

Model neighborhood change using optimal-matching algorithms or spatial discrete markov chains

osnap.analyze.linc(labels_sequence) Local Indicator of Neighborhood Change
osnap.analyze.Sequence(y[, subs_mat, …]) Pairwise sequence analysis.
osnap.analyze.Transition(dataset, w_type[, …]) (Spatial) Markov approaches to transitional dynamics of neighborhood types.
